name: MCKINSEY & COMPANY
sampleDescriptions: Oversight of U.S. Bankruptcy Code implementation with specific reference to anti-competitive activities that could harm creditors, debtors, advisors, consumers, and restructured businesses and their employees; oversight of issues related to McKinsey & Co. work before the Financial Oversight Management Board ("FOMB") in Puerto Rico.

Oversight of U.S. Bankruptcy Code implementation with specific reference to anti-competitive activities that could harm creditors, debtors, advisors, consumers, and restructured businesses and their employees.
Oversight of issues related to McKinsey & Co. work before the Financial Oversight Management Board ("FOMB") in Puerto Rico.
Outreach to facilitate partnerships with Members of Congress and staffs.
